revised_title: Investigating Local Attraction's Effect on the Plumb-Line in the English Arc of the Meridian
tldr: The author examines the impact of local attraction on the plumb-line at stations along the English Arc of the Meridian, between Dunnose and Burleigh Moor, and presents a method for calculating its amount. The study is essential for understanding the figure of the Earth and improving the accuracy of geographical surveys.
